attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In view of the repression of the Tibetan people by the Chinese authorities, we call upon the British government to follow the ethical foreign policy claimed by the labour party and meet with the Dalai Lama.
Also to agree to an international body to investigate what is happening in Tibet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
